page.title: 04NEWTON HOUSE NEWTON ST.CYRES
page.content: Newton House was{burned down}to the ground and{rebuilt in 1907.}The building looks quite old and it is light grey and brown in colour. It looks old fashioned, whilst the building next to Newton House looks new. It looks smaller from the front than it does from the back. The house looks like an L shape at the back. We {counted 53 windows that we could see. There are two large gardens. Formerly the Quicke family home, it has now been{converted into 7 flats. The {footbridge from Newton House to the {Church, which crosses the main road, {is controlled by the residents.}A banner advertising the School SUMMER SHOW/GYMKHANA has been hung from there in the last few years during June. The entrance to Newton House is in Station Road.
